verses.verse: And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

Speak <S%H1696><s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and <S%H413>to<s%> his <S%H1121>sons,<s%> that they separate <S%H5144>themselves<s%> from the holy <S%H4480>things<s%> <S%H6944><s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and that they <S%H2490>profane<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H853><s%> my <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H8034>name<s%> in those things <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H1992>they<s%> <S%H6942>hallow<s%> unto me: <S%H589>I<s%> am the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

Say <S%H559><s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> them, <S%H3605>Whosoever<s%> <S%H376><s%> he be of <S%H4480>all<s%> <S%H3605><s%> your <S%H2233>seed<s%> among your <S%H1755>generations,<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> <S%H7126>goeth<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the holy <S%H6944>things,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H6942>hallow<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> having his <S%H2932>uncleanness<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> him, <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H5315>soul<s%> shall be cut <S%H3772>off<s%> from my <S%H4480>presence:<s%> <S%H6440><s%> <S%H589>I<s%> am the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

What man <S%H376>soever<s%> <S%H376><s%> of the <S%H4480>seed<s%> <S%H2233><s%> of <S%H175>Aaron<s%> is a <S%H6879>leper,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> hath a running <S%H2100>issue;<s%> he shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H398>eat<s%> of the holy <S%H6944>things,<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> <S%H834><s%> he be <S%H2891>clean.<s%> And whoso <S%H5060>toucheth<s%> any <S%H3605>thing<s%> that is <S%H2931>unclean<s%> by the <S%H5315>dead,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H834>whose<s%> <S%H7902>seed<s%> <S%H2233><s%> <S%H3318>goeth<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> him;

Or <S%H176><s%> <S%H376>whosoever<s%> <S%H834><s%> <S%H5060>toucheth<s%> <S%H3605>any<s%> creeping <S%H8318>thing,<s%> <S%H834>whereby<s%> he may be made <S%H2930>unclean,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> a <S%H120>man<s%> of <S%H834>whom<s%> he may take <S%H2930>uncleanness,<s%> <S%H3605>whatsoever<s%> <S%H2932>uncleanness<s%> he hath;

The <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> hath <S%H5060>touched<s%> any such shall be <S%H2930>unclean<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> <S%H6153>even,<s%> and shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H4480>of<s%> the holy <S%H6944>things,<s%> <S%H3588>unless<s%> <S%H518><s%> he <S%H7364>wash<s%> his <S%H1320>flesh<s%> with <S%H4325>water.<s%>

And when the <S%H8121>sun<s%> is <S%H935>down,<s%> he shall be <S%H2891>clean,<s%> and shall <S%H310>afterward<s%> <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H4480>of<s%> the holy <S%H6944>things;<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> <S%H1931>it<s%> is his <S%H3899>food.<s%>

That which dieth of <S%H5038>itself,<s%> or is <S%H2966>torn<s%> with beasts, he shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H398>eat<s%> to <S%H2930>defile<s%> himself therewith: <S%H589>I<s%> am the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

They shall therefore <S%H8104>keep<s%> <S%H853><s%> mine <S%H4931>ordinance,<s%> <S%H3808>lest<s%> they <S%H5375>bear<s%> <S%H2399>sin<s%> <S%H5921>for<s%> it, and <S%H4191>die<s%> therefore, <S%H3588>if<s%> they <S%H2490>profane<s%> it: <S%H589>I<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> do <S%H6942>sanctify<s%> them.

There shall <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H3605><s%> <S%H2114>stranger<s%> <S%H398>eat<s%> of the holy <S%H6944>thing:<s%> a <S%H8453>sojourner<s%> of the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> or a hired <S%H7916>servant,<s%> shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H398>eat<s%> of the holy <S%H6944>thing.<s%>

But <S%H3588>if<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> <S%H7069>buy<s%> any <S%H5315>soul<s%> with his <S%H7075>money,<s%> <S%H3701><s%> <S%H1931>he<s%> shall <S%H398>eat<s%> of it, and he that is <S%H3211>born<s%> in his <S%H1004>house:<s%> <S%H1992>they<s%> shall <S%H398>eat<s%> of his <S%H3899>meat.<s%>

If <S%H3588><s%> the <S%H3548>priest's<s%> <S%H1323>daughter<s%> also <S%H1961>be<s%> married unto a <S%H376>stranger,<s%> <S%H2114><s%> <S%H1931>she<s%> may <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H398>eat<s%> of an <S%H8641>offering<s%> of the holy <S%H6944>things.<s%>

But <S%H3588>if<s%> the <S%H3548>priest's<s%> <S%H1323>daughter<s%> <S%H1961>be<s%> a <S%H490>widow,<s%> or <S%H1644>divorced,<s%> and have <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H2233>child,<s%> and is <S%H7725>returned<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> her <S%H1>father's<s%> <S%H1004>house,<s%> as in her <S%H5271>youth,<s%> she shall <S%H398>eat<s%> of her father's <S%H4480>meat:<s%> <S%H3899><s%> <S%H1><s%> but there shall <S%H3605>no<s%> <S%H3808><s%> <S%H2114>stranger<s%> <S%H398>eat<s%> thereof.

And <S%H3588>if<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H398>eat<s%> of the holy <S%H6944>thing<s%> <S%H7684>unwittingly,<s%> then he shall <S%H3254>put<s%> the <S%H2549>fifth<s%> part thereof <S%H5921>unto<s%> it, and shall <S%H5414>give<s%> it unto the <S%H3548>priest<s%> <S%H853><s%> with the holy <S%H6944>thing.<s%>

And they shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H2490>profane<s%> <S%H853><s%> the holy <S%H6944>things<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H834>which<s%> they <S%H7311>offer<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%>

Or suffer them to <S%H5375>bear<s%> the <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> of <S%H819>trespass,<s%> when they <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H853><s%> their holy <S%H6944>things:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> do <S%H6942>sanctify<s%> them.
And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

Speak <S%H1696><s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> and <S%H413>to<s%> his <S%H1121>sons,<s%> and <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and <S%H559>say<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> them, <S%H376>Whatsoever<s%> <S%H376><s%> he be of the <S%H4480>house<s%> <S%H1004><s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> or <S%H4480>of<s%> the <S%H1616>strangers<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> will <S%H7126>offer<s%> his <S%H7133>oblation<s%> for <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H5088>vows,<s%> and for <S%H3605>all<s%> his freewill <S%H5071>offerings,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> they will <S%H7126>offer<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> for a burnt <S%H5930>offering;<s%>
Ye shall offer at your own <S%H7522>will<s%> a <S%H2145>male<s%> without <S%H8549>blemish,<s%> of the <S%H1241>beefs,<s%> of the <S%H3775>sheep,<s%> or of the <S%H5795>goats.<s%>

But <S%H3605>whatsoever<s%> <S%H834><s%> hath a <S%H3971>blemish,<s%> that shall ye <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H7126>offer:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> it shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H7522>acceptable<s%> for you.

And <S%H376>whosoever<s%> <S%H3588><s%> <S%H7126>offereth<s%> a <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> of peace <S%H8002>offerings<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> to <S%H6381>accomplish<s%> his <S%H5088>vow,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> a freewill <S%H5071>offering<s%> in <S%H1241>beefs<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H6629>sheep,<s%> it shall <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H8549>perfect<s%> to be <S%H7522>accepted;<s%> there shall <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H3605><s%> <S%H3971>blemish<s%> therein.

Blind, <S%H5788><s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H7665>broken,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H2782>maimed,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> having a <S%H2990>wen,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H1618>scurvy,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H3217>scabbed,<s%> ye shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H7126>offer<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H5414>make<s%> an offering by <S%H801>fire<s%> <S%H4480>of<s%> them <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H4196>altar<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

Either a <S%H7794>bullock<s%> or a <S%H7716>lamb<s%> that hath any thing <S%H8311>superfluous<s%> or lacking in his <S%H7038>parts,<s%> that mayest thou <S%H6213>offer<s%> for a freewill <S%H5071>offering;<s%> but for a <S%H5088>vow<s%> it shall <S%H3808>not<s%> be <S%H7521>accepted.<s%>

Ye shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H7126>offer<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> that which is <S%H4600>bruised,<s%> or <S%H3807>crushed,<s%> or <S%H5423>broken,<s%> or <S%H3772>cut;<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> shall ye <S%H6213>make<s%> any offering thereof in your <S%H776>land.<s%>

Neither <S%H3808><s%> from a stranger's <S%H4480>hand<s%> <S%H3027><s%> <S%H1121><s%> <S%H5236><s%> shall ye <S%H7126>offer<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H3899>bread<s%> of your <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H4480>any<s%> <S%H3605><s%> of <S%H428>these;<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> their <S%H4893>corruption<s%> is in them, and <S%H3971>blemishes<s%> be in them: they shall <S%H3808>not<s%> be <S%H7521>accepted<s%> for you.
And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

When <S%H3588><s%> a <S%H7794>bullock,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> a <S%H3775>sheep,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> a <S%H5795>goat,<s%> is brought <S%H3205>forth,<s%> then it shall <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> the <S%H517>dam;<s%> and from the eighth <S%H4480>day<s%> <S%H3117><s%> <S%H8066><s%> and <S%H1973>thenceforth<s%> it shall be <S%H7521>accepted<s%> for an <S%H7133>offering<s%> made by <S%H801>fire<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>
And whether it be <S%H7794>cow<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H7716>ewe,<s%> ye shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H7819>kill<s%> it and her <S%H1121>young<s%> both in <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%>
And <S%H3588>when<s%> ye will <S%H2076>offer<s%> a <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> of <S%H8426>thanksgiving<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H2076>offer<s%> it at your own <S%H7522>will.<s%>

On the <S%H1931>same<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> it shall be eaten <S%H398>up;<s%> ye shall <S%H3498>leave<s%> <S%H3808>none<s%> <S%H4480>of<s%> it <S%H5704>until<s%> the <S%H1242>morrow:<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> am the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>
Therefore shall ye <S%H8104>keep<s%> my <S%H4687>commandments,<s%> and <S%H6213>do<s%> them: <S%H589>I<s%> am the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

Neither <S%H3808><s%> shall ye <S%H2490>profane<s%> <S%H853><s%> my <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H8034>name;<s%> but I will be <S%H6942>hallowed<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> am the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> which <S%H6942>hallow<s%> you,
That brought you <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H853><s%> of the <S%H4480>land<s%> <S%H776><s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> to <S%H1961>be<s%> your <S%H430>God:<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> am the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>
